primary.context: Customer is unable to log into the portal due to an invalid account number error and a previous link failure.
primary.detail: The agent verified the customer and sent a payment link via email and text after the customer reported portal login issues.

secondary.context: Customer reports account number is invalid when trying to access the account.
secondary.detail: The agent offered a new registration link, which the user declined because a previous one failed, so the agent pivoted to the payment intent.

steps: Agent greeted caller and initiated account lookup.
Caller provided name and phone number for verification.
Agent verified caller's identity and state of residence.
Caller explained that the account number is showing as invalid on the portal.
Agent offered a new registration link, which the caller rejected as they had already tried it.
Agent pivoted to the specific goal of making a payment.
Agent confirmed property, contract number, and contact details.
Agent sent a payment link via text and email.

actions.detail: Verified name, phone, and state of residence.
Sent payment link to katieluker1@gmail.com and 8135997661.

insights.summary: The customer called because they were unable to log into their account to make a payment. The agent successfully verified the account and sent a direct payment link to bypass the portal login issues.
insights.verbatim: I'm trying to get into my account. The account number is wrong... You sent me [a link] already and it did not work.
